roleset.name: to bind or place with an employer or craftsman for instruction in trade
roleset.note: APPRENTICE-V NOTES: Verbnet entry orphan-29.7. (from apprentice.01-v)

example.name: carpentry
example.text: John apprenticed with his father to become a carpenter.

example.name: Dark Jedi application-- arg2 as subject
example.text: After the death of Darth Maul, Darth Sidious apprenticed Darth Tyranus who in turn apprenticed several Dark Jedi.
example.arg: After the death of Darth Maul
Darth Tyranus who in turn apprenticed several Dark Jedi

example.name: all args
example.text: Terra Rafael has apprenticed several in her midwifery practice.
